Class Sports

java.lang.Object
Sports
Direct Known Subclasses:
Basketball, Football, Hockey, Soccer
public abstract class Sports
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles all the different sports' information and game actions.
Author:
aezouhri

    • AssignScores

      public void AssignScores​(ScoreTab[] score, int user_choice, Sports game)
      This methods is used to handle the interaction between the user and the ScoreBoard.
      Parameters:
      score - ScoreBoard for the current game.
      user_choice - Choice of what is happening during the game inputted by user.
      game - Current game being played.

    • EndOfGame

      public boolean EndOfGame​(int present_period, int max_period)
      This methods is used to check if the game is over.
      Parameters:
      present_period - Represents the current period played.
      max_period - Represents the total number of periods in a game of the chosen sport.
      Returns:
      True if the game has ended, false otherwise.
